name: Pancakes
instructions: Mix flour, milk, and eggs. Cook on a hot griddle until golden brown.

name: Grilled Cheese Sandwich
instructions: Butter the bread, place cheese between slices, and grill until golden brown.

name: Beef Stroganoff
instructions: Cook beef and mushrooms, add sour cream and serve over noodles.
ingredients: Beef, mushrooms, sour cream, onions, noodles

name: Caesar Salad
instructions: Toss romaine lettuce with Caesar dressing, croutons, and parmesan cheese.
ingredients: Romaine lettuce, Caesar dressing, croutons, parmesan cheese
